document.discussion_title: Fun zone: 49ersâ€™ Ponder determined to enjoy latest NFL chance
document.topic_text: Photo: Joe Mahoney, Associated Press Christian Ponder (5) celebrates with wide receiver Devon Cajuste after his 22-yard touchdown run Saturday. He was a No. 12 draft pick in 2011, but he was released by two teams last year. Christian Ponder (5) celebrates with wide receiver Devon Cajuste... After he tried too hard to impress as a young NFL quarterback, it was clear Christian Ponder wasn't having the same issue last week.
